Header: Five arrested with weapons and other equipment
Content: Colombo (News 1st): Five people were arrested in a search operation carried out in Pindeniya and Kotiyakumbura in Kegalle. Police said following a search operation 12 mobile phones, 02 walkie talkies, 02 axes, 08 knives, a machete, 11 petrol bombs, 16 passports were seized among other equipment. The search was carried out by the Sri Lanka Army, Police and Special Task Force.
